title: The Great Gatsby
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
description: A novel set in the 1920s that explores themes of wealth, love, and the American Dream.

title: A Brief History of Time

description: A landmark book in science, Stephen Hawking explores the nature of time, black holes, and the origins of the universe.
